title: Why does my B1 vibrate from time to time without any warnings on the screen?
answer:
The metal contacts in your B1 may be short-circuited. Check the following three positions. If any foreign matter is found, clean it up.

1.  The five metal contacts in the rear of the headset. Check whether they are damp or there is any water or foreign matter on them.

2.  The five metal terminals in the headset slot on the wrist band. Check whether they are in the same height. Press each terminal to see whether they will bounce back to the normal height. Check whether there is any foreign matter, water drops, or other agents that may cause short circuits.

3.  USB charger contact. Check whether there is any foreign matter, water drops, or other agents that may cause short circuits.
